img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(36\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/89/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2836%29.png)
When you first drop in on Lang-Baw-Baw, a load of soldiers will also appear. You can ignore these and let Lang-Baw-Baw tackle them; they make for a good distraction so you can focus on hitting the frog while it attacks the soldiers.
img_below_text:
When it comes to the one-to-one with Lang-Baw-Baw, you can expect to see the same type of moves that the previous frog bosses have used (if you've taken them all down so far). Expect to see it use its tongue as a whip to try and hit you, which you can dodge and dash away from. It will also leap up and try to belly flop you, as well as use its back kicks to quickly lash out when you're behind it.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(32\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2832%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Foothills Walkthrough \(36\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/89/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2836%29.png)
When you first drop in on Lang-Baw-Baw, a load of soldiers will also appear. You can ignore these and let Lang-Baw-Baw tackle them; they make for a good distraction so you can focus on hitting the frog while it attacks the soldiers."
            - Following Text: "When it comes to the one-to-one with Lang-Baw-Baw, you can expect to see the same type of moves that the previous frog bosses have used (if you've taken them all down so far). Expect to see it use its tongue as a whip to try and hit you, which you can dodge and dash away from. It will also leap up and try to belly flop you, as well as use its back kicks to quickly lash out when you're behind it.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(32\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2832%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts a tense combat scenario in *Black Myth: Wukong*, featuring the player character facing off against Lang-Baw-Baw, a large frog-like boss. Lang-Baw-Baw is mid-attack, extending its tongue as a whip-like strike toward the player, who is poised with a staff weapon in a rocky, open arena.

2. **Purpose and Narrative Role**:  
The image illustrates a key moment in the boss fight against Lang-Baw-Baw, emphasizing its signature tongue attack. This visual complements the preceding and following text, which describe strategies for dealing with Lang-Baw-Baw's moves, including its tongue whip, belly flops, and back kicks. It serves to highlight the dynamic and challenging nature of the encounter.
